descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/37148771@N07/8418355083/][img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8215/8418355083_a1dabe7619.jpg[/img][/url]

A new unique armour set for people to find in Skyrim. Can\'t be tempered or crafted, there is only one. Should work for male, female, beast. The cuirass has it\'s own enchantment, reflecting the Spriggan\'s healing ability. Gauntlets and leg bits do not have any enchant.

Picture shows full set, so no mask or shield. I believe there is a Spriggan mask mod floating around somewhere already by someone else.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Using left overs from some Hag\'s Spriggan sacrifice rituals a crafty Forsworn has managed to make a set of Spriggan armour with fashion inspiration from his/her best buds the Falmer, so the legend goes.

Which Forsworn camp ? Time for you to explore the Reach to find out !*

*or just explore the creation kit.

Enjoy ;)

-Free to use in other mods, just give credit-

INSTALL: Get all the stuff INSIDE the data folder found in the .zip and put it inside your data folder found in your Skyrim directory. Enable the MIKE_sprigArmor.esp at start up.
author: M I K E
